channel.title: The Bugle Call on CoNime
channel.description: Recent content in The Bugle Call on CoNime

item.title: The Bugle Call: Song of War Volume 1 Released by VIZ, A Tale of War, Music, and a Bugler's Fate
item.description: VIZ Media has officially released The Bugle Call: Song of War Volume 1, a fantasy manga by Mozuku Sora and Higoro Toumori that blends music, strategy, and supernatural powers.
